episodeMeta.title: 상담/면담의 시작, 말문이 막히다
episodeMeta.coreQuestion: 말하지 못한 이유는 무엇이고, 누가 그걸 먼저 알아차릴까?

nodes.text_ko: 한소연은 교무실 앞 복도에 멈춰 선다. 문 너머로 들리는 교사들의 낮은 목소리가 낯설게 느껴진다.
nodes.text_en: Soyeon stops in the hallway in front of the teachers' office. The low voices of teachers beyond the door feel unfamiliar.
nodes.text_ja: ソヨンは職員室の前の廊下で立ち止まる。ドア越しに聞こえる教師たちの低い声が不思議に感じられる。
nodes.background_prompt_en: A quiet school hallway with a closed office door, soft daylight filtering through windows, bulletin board nearby, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Characters: HAN_SOYEON
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Characters: HAN_SOYEON | no readable text, focus on hallway and closed office door.

nodes.text_ko: 박혜원 선생님이 문을 열고 소연을 바라본다. 짧은 침묵이 흐른다.
nodes.text_en: Ms. Hyewon opens the door and looks at Soyeon. A brief silence passes.
nodes.text_ja: ヘウォン先生がドアを開けてソヨンを見る。短い沈黙が流れる。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office door slightly open, light spilling into the hallway, desks and cabinets visible inside, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon stands by the open office door, Soyeon stands in the hallway.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon holds the door open, Soyeon stands facing her, both visible from the side.

nodes.text_ko: 박혜원: 소연아, 잠깐 들어올래?
nodes.text_en: Hyewon: Soyeon, would you come in for a moment?
nodes.text_ja: ヘウォン: ソヨン、ちょっと入ってくれる？
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office door open, interior visible with desks and chairs, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon gestures toward the open door, Soyeon stands nearby.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon gestures with her hand, Soyeon hesitates at the threshold.

nodes.text_ko: 한소연: 네, 선생님.
nodes.text_en: Soyeon: Yes, teacher.
nodes.text_ja: ソヨン: はい、先生。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Inside the teachers' office, desks with stacks of papers, window with daylight, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Soyeon steps inside, Hyewon stands by the door.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Soyeon enters the office, Hyewon holds the door open.

nodes.text_ko: 소연은 조심스럽게 의자에 앉는다. 책상 위에는 성적표와 상담 기록지가 놓여 있다.
nodes.text_en: Soyeon carefully sits down. On the desk are a grade report and a counseling record sheet.
nodes.text_ja: ソヨンは慎重に椅子に座る。机の上には成績表と相談記録用紙が置かれている。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank papers and a closed folder, pen holder, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Soyeon sits at the desk, Hyewon stands nearby.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Soyeon sits, hands on lap, Hyewon stands beside the desk, blank papers visible.

nodes.text_ko: 박혜원: 최근에 성적이 조금 내려간 것 같더라. 무슨 일 있었니?
nodes.text_en: Hyewon: It seems your grades have dropped a little recently. Did something happen?
nodes.text_ja: ヘウォン: 最近、成績が少し下がったみたいだけど、何かあった？
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank grade sheet and counseling form, window in background, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon sits across from Soyeon, blank grade sheet on desk.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon gestures to the blank grade sheet, Soyeon looks down.

nodes.text_ko: 한소연: 그냥… 조금 실수했어요.
nodes.text_en: Soyeon: I just… made a small mistake.
nodes.text_ja: ソヨン: ただ…ちょっとミスしただけです。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet, pen, and closed folder, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Soyeon looks down at the desk, Hyewon observes her.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Soyeon sits with hands clasped, gaze lowered, blank counseling sheet visible.

nodes.text_ko: 박혜원: 실수라기엔 네가 너무 힘들어 보여서. 혹시 부담되는 게 있니?
nodes.text_en: Hyewon: You seem more troubled than just a mistake. Is there something weighing on you?
nodes.text_ja: ヘウォン: ミスだけにしては、すごく大変そうに見えるけど。何か気になることがある？
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet and pen, window with soft light, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon leans forward slightly, Soyeon sits quietly.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon leans forward, hands on desk, Soyeon sits with hands in lap.

nodes.text_ko: 소연은 대답 대신 상담 기록지를 바라본다. 펜이 책상 위에 놓여 있다.
nodes.text_en: Instead of answering, Soyeon looks at the counseling record sheet. A pen rests on the desk.
nodes.text_ja: ソヨンは答えずに相談記録用紙を見つめる。ペンが机の上に置かれている。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet and pen, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon sits at the desk, gaze fixed on the blank counseling sheet.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon sits, hands on lap, looking at the blank counseling sheet and pen.

nodes.text_ko: A) 한소연: '아무 일도 없어요.'라고 말한다. / B) 한소연: 상담 기록지에 펜을 들고 무언가 적으려다 멈춘다. / C) 한소연: 박혜원을 바라보다 시선을 피한다.
nodes.text_en: A) Soyeon: Says, 'Nothing happened.' / B) Soyeon: Picks up the pen to write on the counseling sheet but stops. / C) Soyeon: Looks at Hyewon and then averts her gaze.
nodes.text_ja: A) ソヨン: 「何もありません」と言う。 / B) ソヨン: 相談記録用紙にペンを持って書こうとするが止める。 / C) ソヨン: ヘウォンを見てから視線をそらす。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet and pen, window in background, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Soyeon and Hyewon sit across the desk, counseling sheet and pen between them.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Soyeon sits with counseling sheet and pen in front, Hyewon sits across.

nodes.text_ko: 한소연: 아무 일도 없어요.
nodes.text_en: Soyeon: Nothing happened.
nodes.text_ja: ソヨン: 何もありません。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet and pen, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Soyeon sits upright, hands folded, Hyewon watches her.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Soyeon speaks quietly, hands folded, blank counseling sheet visible.

nodes.text_ko: 소연은 펜을 집어 들고 상담 기록지 위에 멈춘다.
nodes.text_en: Soyeon picks up the pen and pauses over the counseling sheet.
nodes.text_ja: ソヨンはペンを手に取り、相談記録用紙の上で止まる。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet, pen held above paper, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Soyeon holds a pen above the blank counseling sheet, Hyewon observes.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Soyeon holds pen above blank paper, Hyewon watches from across the desk.

nodes.text_ko: 소연은 박혜원을 바라보다가 시선을 피한다. 펜이 상담 기록지 옆에 놓여 있다.
nodes.text_en: Soyeon looks at Hyewon, then averts her gaze. The pen lies next to the counseling sheet.
nodes.text_ja: ソヨンはヘウォンを見てから視線をそらす。ペンが相談記録用紙の横に置かれている。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet and pen beside it, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Soyeon glances at Hyewon, then looks away, pen beside blank counseling sheet.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Soyeon looks at Hyewon, then turns her head, pen beside blank paper.

nodes.text_ko: 박혜원: 정말 아무 일도 없다고 생각해?
nodes.text_en: Hyewon: Do you really think nothing happened?
nodes.text_ja: ヘウォン: 本当に何もなかったと思う？
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet and pen, window in background, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon sits across from Soyeon, hands resting on desk.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon leans forward, hands on desk, Soyeon sits quietly.

nodes.text_ko: 박혜원: 적으려다 멈춘 이유가 있을까?
nodes.text_en: Hyewon: Is there a reason you stopped before writing?
nodes.text_ja: ヘウォン: 書こうとして止めた理由があるの？
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet, pen held in Soyeon's hand, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon looks at Soyeon holding pen above blank paper.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon observes Soyeon holding pen, counseling sheet blank.

nodes.text_ko: 박혜원: 네가 나를 피하는 것 같아 보여.
nodes.text_en: Hyewon: It seems like you're avoiding me.
nodes.text_ja: ヘウォン: 私を避けているように見えるよ。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet and pen beside it, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon looks at Soyeon, Soyeon averts her gaze.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon faces Soyeon, Soyeon turns her head away, pen beside paper.

nodes.text_ko: 소연은 상담 기록지 구석을 손끝으로 만진다.
nodes.text_en: Soyeon touches the corner of the counseling sheet with her fingertip.
nodes.text_ja: ソヨンは相談記録用紙の端を指先で触れる。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet, Soyeon's hand touching the corner, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon's hand rests on the corner of the blank counseling sheet.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon's hand touches the edge of blank counseling sheet on desk.

nodes.text_ko: 소연은 펜을 내려놓고 상담 기록지를 뒤집는다.
nodes.text_en: Soyeon puts down the pen and flips the counseling sheet over.
nodes.text_ja: ソヨンはペンを置き、相談記録用紙を裏返す。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet turned over, pen beside it, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon places pen down and flips the counseling sheet.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon flips blank counseling sheet, pen beside paper.

nodes.text_ko: 소연은 시선을 바닥으로 내리고 손으로 무릎을 만진다.
nodes.text_en: Soyeon lowers her gaze to the floor and touches her knee with her hand.
nodes.text_ja: ソヨンは視線を床に落とし、手で膝を触れる。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet and pen, Soyeon's hand on her knee, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon sits, gaze down, hand resting on her knee.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon sits, looking down, hand on knee, blank counseling sheet on desk.

nodes.text_ko: 박혜원: 네가 왜 이렇게까지 버티는지 궁금해.
nodes.text_en: Hyewon: I wonder why you keep holding on like this.
nodes.text_ja: ヘウォン: どうしてそこまで我慢するのか気になるよ。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet and pen, window in background, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon sits across from Soyeon, hands folded on desk.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon leans forward, hands together, Soyeon sits quietly.

nodes.text_ko: 박혜원: 네가 적지 못하는 이유를 알고 싶어.
nodes.text_en: Hyewon: I want to know why you can't write it down.
nodes.text_ja: ヘウォン: 書けない理由を知りたいな。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet, pen beside it, window in background, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon looks at Soyeon, pen beside blank counseling sheet.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon gestures to blank counseling sheet, Soyeon sits quietly.

nodes.text_ko: 박혜원: 네가 말하지 않아도 괜찮아. 그냥 네가 힘들어 보였어.
nodes.text_en: Hyewon: It's okay if you don't say anything. You just seemed to be struggling.
nodes.text_ja: ヘウォン: 話さなくても大丈夫。ただ、つらそうに見えたから。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet and pen, window in background, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon sits across from Soyeon, hands open on desk.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon sits with hands open, Soyeon sits quietly.

nodes.text_ko: 소연은 상담 기록지 위에 손을 올려놓는다.
nodes.text_en: Soyeon places her hand on top of the counseling sheet.
nodes.text_ja: ソヨンは相談記録用紙の上に手を置く。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet, Soyeon's hand resting on top, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon's hand rests on blank counseling sheet on desk.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon's hand covers blank counseling sheet on desk.

nodes.text_ko: 소연은 상담 기록지를 조용히 밀어둔다.
nodes.text_en: Soyeon quietly pushes the counseling sheet aside.
nodes.text_ja: ソヨンは相談記録用紙を静かに脇に寄せる。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet pushed aside, pen nearby, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon pushes blank counseling sheet to the side.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon slides blank counseling sheet away on desk.

nodes.text_ko: 소연은 무릎 위에서 손을 꼭 쥔다.
nodes.text_en: Soyeon clasps her hands tightly on her lap.
nodes.text_ja: ソヨンは膝の上で手をぎゅっと握る。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet and pen, Soyeon's hands clasped on her lap, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon sits with hands clasped on lap, blank counseling sheet on desk.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon sits, hands tightly clasped on lap, blank counseling sheet visible.

nodes.text_ko: 박혜원: 네가 말해주지 않아도, 나는 기다릴 수 있어.
nodes.text_en: Hyewon: Even if you don't tell me, I can wait.
nodes.text_ja: ヘウォン: 話してくれなくても、私は待てるよ。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet and pen, window in background, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon sits across from Soyeon, hands folded on desk.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon sits with hands together, Soyeon sits quietly.

nodes.text_ko: 박혜원: 네가 준비되면 언제든 말해줘.
nodes.text_en: Hyewon: Tell me whenever you're ready.
nodes.text_ja: ヘウォン: 準備ができたら、いつでも話してね。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet and pen, window in background, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon sits across from Soyeon, hands open on desk.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon gestures with open hands, Soyeon sits quietly.

nodes.text_ko: 박혜원: 네가 힘들 때, 내가 곁에 있다는 걸 기억해.
nodes.text_en: Hyewon: Remember that I'm here when things are hard.
nodes.text_ja: ヘウォン: つらいときは、私がそばにいることを思い出して。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet and pen, window in background, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon sits across from Soyeon, hands resting on desk.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon sits with hands on desk, Soyeon sits quietly.

nodes.text_ko: 소연은 상담 기록지를 조용히 챙긴다.
nodes.text_en: Soyeon quietly gathers the counseling sheet.
nodes.text_ja: ソヨンは相談記録用紙を静かに片付ける。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet being picked up, pen nearby, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon picks up blank counseling sheet from desk.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon gathers blank counseling sheet, pen remains on desk.

nodes.text_ko: 소연은 펜을 제자리에 두고 자리에서 일어난다.
nodes.text_en: Soyeon puts the pen back in place and stands up.
nodes.text_ja: ソヨンはペンを元の場所に戻し、席を立つ。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with pen placed neatly, blank counseling sheet on desk, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon stands up, pen placed on desk, blank counseling sheet visible.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon stands, pen on desk, blank counseling sheet visible.

nodes.text_ko: 소연은 무릎 위에서 손을 풀고 천천히 일어난다.
nodes.text_en: Soyeon unclenches her hands from her lap and slowly stands up.
nodes.text_ja: ソヨンは膝の上で手をほどき、ゆっくり立ち上がる。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet and pen, chair pushed back, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon stands up, chair slightly pushed back, blank counseling sheet on desk.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: HAN_SOYEON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON. Soyeon stands, hands relaxed, chair moved back, blank counseling sheet visible.

nodes.text_ko: 박혜원: 오늘 상담은 여기까지 할게.
nodes.text_en: Hyewon: We'll end the counseling here for today.
nodes.text_ja: ヘウォン: 今日の相談はここまでにしようか。
nodes.background_prompt_en: Teachers' office desk with blank counseling sheet and pen, window in background, no people.
nodes.character_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon stands near the desk, Soyeon stands up.
nodes.nanobanana_prompt_en: Speaker: PARK_HYEWON. Characters: HAN_SOYEON, PARK_HYEWON. Hyewon stands by desk, Soyeon stands nearby, blank counseling sheet visible.

nodes.text_ko: 박혜원: 다음에 또 이야기하자.
nodes.text_en: Hyewon: Let's talk again next time.
